name: STARDUST - GDKO 2023 Round 2
description:
/!\ PLEASE WEAR HEADPHONES FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

CONTROLS:

Just CLICK and DRAG where you want to move. 

Left and Right panning sound is easier to hear then Up and Down sadly. If you don't find the next collectible, try the opposite direction. Trust your senses, close your eyes...

Enjoy this short sensory experience.

Music made by myself using OP-1 and Digitone synthesizers, feeding into modules like MI Clouds, Qu Bit Nebulae and Qu Bit Data Bender.
